GSD.product_version: versions from v4.8 to before v5.18.4
GSD.description:
net: ethernet: bgmac: Fix refcount leak in bcma_mdio_mii_register

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit 7fb1fe7d9a167205413f1de8db9f7d0f82c78286, it was introduced in version v4.8 by commit 55954f3bfdacc5908515b0c306cea23e77fab740. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: ethernet: bgmac: Fix refcount leak in bcma_mdio_mii_register
